name: calendars
description: The calendar package for handling various time related classes for creating a custom calendars. The classes intends to be compatible with TC39 proposal.

scripts.test: npm run compile && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --harmonize --recursive \"./dist/test/*.test.{js,cjs,mjs}\"

author: Antti Kautiainen <antti@kautiainen.com>
